chimney.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a vertical pipe that allows smoke from a fire to pass out of a building up into the air, or the part of this pipe that is above the roof
chimney.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We can’t light a fire because the chimney hasn’t been swept.
chimney.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a tall vertical structure containing a chimney
chimney.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a narrow opening in tall rocks or cliffs that you can climb up
